trustBar.heading: Trusted by streamers across Kick and Twitch

impact.heading: Our Commitment to You
impact.description: Real organic growth. No bots, no fake engagement â€” ever. You get full transparency, weekly performance reports, and a distribution strategy built around your stream.

services.heading: How We Grow Your Audience
services.subtitle: From clipping to posting to reporting â€” we handle every step of turning your streams into audience growth.

items.label: AUTOMATED CLIPPING
items.title: Clip Distribution
items.description: Our clipper network captures your best moments and pushes them across TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts â€” so your highlights reach millions, not just your live viewers.

items.label: CROSS-PLATFORM
items.title: Campaign Management
items.description: We plan, schedule, and run your clip campaigns across every platform â€” so each post lands with the right audience at the right time.

items.label: REAL-TIME DATA
items.title: Growth Analytics
items.description: See exactly which clips drive followers, which platforms perform best, and where your audience is growing â€” updated in real time.

items.label: ALGORITHM-FIRST
items.title: Content Optimization
items.description: Every clip is edited, captioned, and timed for maximum reach â€” built around what TikTok and Instagram algorithms actually reward.

items.label: EVERYWHERE AT ONCE
items.title: Multi-Platform Reach
items.description: One stream, every platform. Your clips go live simultaneously across TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts from a single campaign.

items.label: STAY AHEAD
items.title: Trend Detection
items.description: Our team tracks trending sounds, formats, and hashtags in real time â€” so your clips ride the wave instead of chasing it.

items.label: GROW YOUR TRIBE
items.title: Community Building
items.description: Consistent, high-quality clips keep your name in people's feeds â€” turning casual viewers into loyal followers across every platform.

items.label: WEEKLY INSIGHTS
items.title: Performance Reports
items.description: Every week you get a clear breakdown of clip performance, audience growth, and what to do next â€” no guesswork required.

steps.title: You Stream
steps.description: Go live on Kick or Twitch like you always do. Focus on your content â€” that's the only job you have.

steps.title: We Clip & Distribute
steps.description: Our clippers catch your best moments, edit them for short-form, and post them across TikTok and Instagram Reels.

steps.title: Your Audience Grows
steps.description: New viewers discover you through clips and follow your stream. You grow on autopilot while doing what you already love.

whyChoose.heading: Why Choose Audience Labs
whyChoose.subtitle: Built for streamers who want real growth â€” not vanity metrics.

items.title: Performance-Based Model
items.description: Our pricing reflects real results. When your clips perform, we both win â€” that's how we keep ourselves accountable.

items.title: Zero Effort Required
items.description: You stream. We clip, edit, caption, schedule, and post. The only thing you need to do is keep going live.

items.title: Algorithm-Optimized Content
items.description: Every clip is built for the feed â€” right format, right captions, right timing â€” based on what actually performs on TikTok and Instagram.

items.title: Scalable Clipper Network
items.description: More streams, more clips, more reach. Our network scales with you â€” so no highlight goes unclipped, no matter how often you go live.

founders.bio: Full-stack engineer passionate about creating automations that help businesses scale and developing machine learning models. I built Audience Labs to combine intelligent automation, data-driven distribution, and a network of skilled clippers to turn streams into viral moments.

Cybersecurity specialist and former FRC robotics team captain with a passion for building resilient systems. At Audience Labs, he leads security infrastructure and network architecture to ensure the clipper platform scales safely and reliably.

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know before getting started.

items.question: Can I control what gets clipped and how accounts look?
items.answer: Yes. During onboarding you set the rules â€” account style, which streams to clip, any content guidelines. We follow your direction exactly. If something doesn't feel right, let us know and we'll fix it immediately.

items.question: Do I need to give you access to my social media accounts?
items.answer: Never. We create and manage dedicated clip accounts built around your channel. Your personal accounts stay 100% in your control â€” no passwords, no access needed. You approve the setup during onboarding and we handle the rest.

items.question: Is there a minimum contract or can I cancel anytime?
items.answer: No contracts, no lock-in. We work month to month and you can cancel anytime â€” zero fees. Our results keep you around, not paperwork.

items.question: How much does it cost?
items.answer: It depends on your stream volume, target platforms, and clips per week. We have flexible plans for everyone from new streamers to full-scale operations. Book a free call and we'll recommend a plan that fits.

items.question: I'm a small streamer â€” is this worth it for me?
items.answer: Yes â€” and you might see the biggest growth. Short-form clips introduce you to audiences who'd never find your stream otherwise. Many of our best success stories started with under 50 average viewers.

items.question: Will the clips actually feel like my brand?
items.answer: That's non-negotiable for us. We study your stream style, humor, and audience during onboarding â€” then match you with clippers who genuinely get your content. If a clip ever feels off-brand, flag it and we adjust instantly.

items.question: What if my growth doesn't improve?
items.answer: You'll always see exactly what's happening through transparent analytics. If results aren't where they should be, we adjust â€” different clip styles, posting times, or platforms. Most streamers see measurable growth within 2-4 weeks.

cta.heading: Your Audience Won't Grow Itself
cta.description: Every stream without a clip strategy is growth left on the table. Book a free discovery call and see exactly how we can grow your channel.

sections.heading: Introduction
sections.content: Audience Labs, operated by Mindora Systems & Growth, is committed to protecting the privacy of streamers and visitors who use our content distribution services. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you interact with our platform and services.

sections.heading: Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect a limited set of information that you provide directly: your email address, streaming channel name, and platform links (e.g. Kick or Twitch profile URLs). We also gather basic technical data such as IP addresses, browser type, and device information when you visit our website. We do not collect your passwords, login credentials, or request access to your personal streaming or social media accounts.

sections.heading: How We Use Your Information
sections.content: We use your information to provide and manage our content distribution services, communicate with you about your campaigns and account, process payments and manage billing, and comply with legal obligations. We do not sell your personal information to third parties.

sections.heading: Content Distribution & Third Parties
sections.content: Clips distributed through our service are derived from publicly available broadcast content. Distribution may be carried out by independent third-party clip creators who operate their own accounts. Audience Labs coordinates this distribution network but does not control the accounts used for distribution. No personal user data is shared with these independent third parties â€” only publicly available stream content is used.

sections.heading: Data Security
sections.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information, including encrypted data transmission and secure server infrastructure. However, no method of electronic transmission or storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

sections.heading: Your Rights
sections.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. You may also request a copy of the data we hold about you or withdraw your consent for data processing at any time. To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at info@mindorasystems.com.

sections.heading: Changes to This Policy
sections.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the updated policy on our website and updating the 'Last updated' date. Your continued use of our services after any changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

sections.heading: Contact Us
sections.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at info@mindorasystems.com.

sections.heading: Agreement to Terms
sections.content: By accessing or using the services provided by Audience Labs (operated by Mindora Systems & Growth), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.

sections.heading: Description of Services
sections.content: Audience Labs provides content distribution and visibility services for streamers on platforms such as Kick and Twitch. Our services are delivered on a best-effort basis and include coordinating the distribution of stream-derived clips across short-form content platforms such as TikTok and Instagram Reels, and providing campaign-level reporting. Audience Labs does not guarantee any specific outcomes including but not limited to views, followers, virality, or revenue.

sections.heading: Campaign-Based Model
sections.content: Audience Labs operates on a campaign-based model, not a subscription. Each campaign covers a defined time period agreed upon during onboarding. Upon completion of a campaign period, distributed content may remain live on third-party platforms. Continuation of services requires a new campaign agreement.

sections.heading: Distribution Accounts & Third Parties
sections.content: Clips are distributed through accounts that are not owned by or affiliated with the client. These accounts may be operated by independent third-party clip creators coordinated by Audience Labs. The client has no ownership claim over any distribution accounts used in the campaign. Audience Labs is not liable for actions taken by third-party platforms or account operators, including but not limited to account suspensions, content removals, or policy changes.

sections.heading: Content Rights & Copyright
sections.content: By using our services, the client represents and warrants that they are the rightful owner of the stream content provided, or have obtained all necessary permissions to use such content. The client grants Audience Labs a non-exclusive, royalty-free license to clip, edit, and distribute portions of their stream content across supported platforms for the duration of the campaign. Responsibility for any copyright infringement claims arising from the provided content lies solely with the client. Audience Labs does not initiate copyright claims on behalf of clients. Upon client request, distribution of specific content can be halted.

sections.heading: Content Originality
sections.content: Content is prepared specifically for each client and may be produced in different edits, formats, and variations. The same source material may be distributed in multiple versions across platforms. Audience Labs applies duplicate content avoidance practices but does not guarantee that no content overlap will occur.

sections.heading: Payment & Billing
sections.content: Campaign pricing is determined during onboarding and is payable as a one-time fee per campaign period. Payment is due before the campaign begins. Audience Labs reserves the right to adjust pricing for future campaigns with prior notice.

sections.heading: Cancellation & Refund Policy
sections.content: Cancellation is possible before a campaign has started, in which case a full refund will be issued. Once a campaign has commenced, no refunds will be provided. Custom-configured campaign packages are non-refundable. Audience Labs may terminate a client's campaign if the client violates these terms or engages in fraudulent activity.

sections.heading: Performance Disclaimer
sections.content: Audience Labs provides a content distribution and visibility service, not a results guarantee. Views, follower growth, engagement, virality, and revenue are influenced by factors outside of Audience Labs' control, including but not limited to platform algorithms, content quality, market conditions, and audience behaviour. No specific performance outcomes are promised or implied.

sections.heading: Limitation of Liability
sections.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Audience Labs and Mindora Systems & Growth shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from the use of our services, including but not limited to loss of revenue, data, or audience metrics. Our total liability shall not exceed the amount paid by the client for the relevant campaign.

sections.heading: Governing Law
sections.content: These Terms of Service are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of England and Wales. Any disputes arising from these terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of England and Wales.

sections.heading: Changes to Terms
sections.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. We will provide notice of material changes via email or through our platform. Continued use of our services after such modifications constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.

sections.heading: What Are Cookies
sections.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They help the website remember your preferences and improve your browsing experience. Audience Labs (operated by Mindora Systems & Growth) uses cookies and similar technologies on our website.

sections.heading: How We Use Cookies
sections.content: We use cookies to ensure our website functions properly, remember your language preference (English or Turkish), analyze website traffic and usage patterns, and improve our website performance and user experience.

sections.heading: Types of Cookies We Use
sections.content: Essential cookies are required for the website to function and cannot be disabled. They include cookies for language selection and session management. Analytics cookies help us understand how visitors use our website by collecting anonymous usage data. Preference cookies remember your settings and choices, such as your selected language, to provide a more personalized experience.

sections.heading: Third-Party Cookies
sections.content: Some cookies are placed by third-party services that appear on our pages. We use Cal.com for booking scheduling, which may set its own cookies. We do not control third-party cookies and recommend reviewing their respective privacy policies for more information.

sections.heading: Managing Cookies
sections.content: You can control and manage cookies through your browser settings. Most browsers allow you to block or delete cookies. However, disabling essential cookies may affect the functionality of our website. Blocking cookies may prevent certain features, such as language preferences, from working correctly.

sections.heading: Changes to This Policy
sections.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in technology or legal requirements. Any updates will be posted on this page with a revised 'Last updated' date.

sections.heading: Contact Us
sections.content: If you have questions about our use of cookies, please contact us at info@mindorasystems.com.

footer.description: Turning stream highlights into audience growth through clip distribution across TikTok and Instagram Reels.
